name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
"And my report is this: the State of the Union is strong‚Äîbecause you, the American people, are strong." 
  
"We are stronger today than we were a year ago." 
  
"And we will be stronger a year from now than we are today." #SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: "We are the only nation on Earth that has always turned every crisis we have faced into an opportunity." #SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: https://t.co/7XoMuJYhsD

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
"Support our veterans.
Veterans are the best of us." #SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: "And let‚Äôs get all Americans the mental health services they need. More people they can turn to for help, and full parity between physical and mental health care." #SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: "While it often appears that we never agree, that isn‚Äôt true. I signed 80 bipartisan bills into law last year. From preventing government shutdowns to protecting Asian-Americans from still-too-common hate crimes to reforming military justice." #SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
"In state after state, new laws have been passed, not only to suppress the vote, but to subvert entire elections." 
  
"We cannot let this happen." 
#SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: "We should all agree: The answer is not to Defund the police. The answer is to FUND the police with the resources and training they need to protect our communities." #SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
"I know what works: Investing in crime preventionand community police officers who‚Äôll walk the beat, who‚Äôll know the neighborhood, and who can restore trust and safety." 

"So let‚Äôs not abandon our streets."
#SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: "Let‚Äôs stop seeing each other as enemies, and start seeing each other for who we really are: Fellow Americans." #SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: "Our schools are open. Let‚Äôs keep it that way. Our kids need to be in school." #SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: "We‚Äôre leaving no one behind or ignoring anyone‚Äôs needs as we move forward." #SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: "And we‚Äôre launching the ‚ÄúTest to Treat‚Äù initiative so people can get tested at a pharmacy, and if they‚Äôre positive, receive antiviral pills on the spot at no cost." #SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: "Thanks to the progress we have made this past year, COVID-19 need no longer control our lives." #COVID

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: "We‚Äôll also cut costs and keep the economy going strong by giving workers a fair shot, provide more training and apprenticeships, hire them based on their skills not degrees." #SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
"And as Wall Street firms take over more nursing homes, quality in those homes has gone down and costs have gone up."  
  
"That ends on my watch."
#SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: "And tonight, I‚Äôm announcing that the Justice Department will name a chief prosecutor for pandemic fraud." #SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
"The previous Administration not only ballooned the deficit with tax cuts for the very wealthy and corporations, it undermined the watchdogs whose job was to keep pandemic relief funds from being wasted."
  
"But in my administration, the watchdogs have been welcomed back."#SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: "That‚Äôs why I‚Äôve proposed closing loopholes so the very wealthy don‚Äôt pay a lower tax rate than a teacher or a firefighter." #SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: "I‚Äôm not looking to punish anyone. But let‚Äôs make sure corporations and the wealthiest Americans start paying their fair share.  Just last year, 55 Fortune 500 corporations earned $40 billion in profits and paid zero dollars in federal income tax." #SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
"And under my plan, nobody earning less than $400,000 a year will pay an additional penny in new taxes."

"Nobody."  
#SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: "Cut the cost of child care. Many families pay up to $14,000 a year for child care per child.  Middle-class and working families shouldn‚Äôt have to pay more than 7% of their income for care of young children." #SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: "Look, the American Rescue Plan is helping millions of families on Affordable Care Act plans save $2,400 a year on their health care premiums. Let‚Äôs close the coverage gap and make those savings permanent." #SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: "For Joshua, and for the 200,000 other young people with Type 1 diabetes, let‚Äôs cap the cost of insulin at $35 a month so everyone can afford it. " #SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: "First ‚Äì cut the cost of prescription drugs. Just look at insulin. One in ten Americans has diabetes."

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
"And instead of relying on foreign supply chains, let‚Äôs make it in America." 
 
"Economists call it ‚Äúincreasing the productive capacity of our economy.‚Äù 
#SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
"One (bad) way to fight inflation is to drive down wages and make Americans poorer.  I have a better plan to fight inflation." 
  
"Lower your costs, not your wages."
#SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: "All told, we created 369,000 new manufacturing jobs in America just last year." #SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: "Companies are choosing to build new factories here, when just a few years ago, they would have built them overseas." #SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: "We will buy American to make sure everything from the deck of an aircraft carrier to the steel on highway guardrails are made in America." #SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: "There‚Äôs been a law on the books for almost a century to make sure taxpayers‚Äô dollars support American jobs and businesses. Every Administration says they‚Äôll do it, but we are actually doing it. " #SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: "And tonight, I‚Äôm announcing that this year we will start fixing over 65,000 miles of highway and 1,500 bridges in disrepair. When we use taxpayer dollars to rebuild America ‚Äì we are going to Buy American: buy American products to support American jobs. " #SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
"As I‚Äôve told Xi Jinping, it is never a good bet to bet against the American people. 
We‚Äôll create good jobs for millions of Americans, modernizing roads, airports, ports, and waterways all across America." #SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: "For the past 40 years we were told that if we gave tax breaks to those at the very top, the benefits would trickle down to everyone else.  But trickle-down theory led to weaker economic growth" #SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: "And unlike the $2 Trillion tax cut passed in the previous administration that benefitted the top 1% of Americans, the American Rescue Plan helped working people‚Äîand left no one behind. And it worked. It created jobs. Lots of jobs." #SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: "That‚Äôs why one of the first things I did as President was fight to pass the American Rescue Plan. Because people were hurting. We needed to act, and we did. "  #SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
"To our fellow Ukrainian Americans who forge a deep bond that connects our two nations we stand with you." 
  
"Putin may circle Kyiv with tanks, but he will never gain the hearts and souls of the Ukrainian people." #SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: "In the battle between democracy and autocracy, democracies are rising to the moment, and the world is clearly choosing the side of peace and security." #SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
"When the history of this era is written Putin‚Äôs war on Ukraine will have left Russia weaker and the rest of the world stronger." 
 "While it shouldn‚Äôt have taken something so terrible for people around the world to see what‚Äôs at stake now everyone sees it clearly. " #SOTU

tweet_text:
And a proud Ukrainian people, who have known 30 years  of independence, have repeatedly shown that they will not tolerate anyone who tries to take their country backwards.

And we will continue to aid the Ukrainian people as they defend their country and to help ease their suffering." #SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: "The Russian stock market has lost 40% of its value and trading remains suspended. Russia‚Äôs economy is reeling and Putin alone is to blame." #SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle

"We countered Russia‚Äôs lies with truth.   
 And now that he has acted the free world is holding him accountable." #SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: "He thought the West and NATO wouldn‚Äôt respond. And he thought he could divide us at home. Putin was wrong. We are ready." #SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: "It matters. American diplomacy matters. American resolve matters. " #SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: "And with an unwavering resolve that freedom will always triumph over tyranny." #SOTU

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
It‚Äôs never been a good bet to bet against America. 

And it still isn‚Äôt. 
 #JointAddress

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: We have stared into an abyss of insurrection and autocracy ‚Äî of pandemic and pain ‚Äî and ‚ÄúWe the People‚Äù did not flinch.  #JointAddress

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
And if we do, then we will meet the central challenge of the age by proving that democracy is durable and strong. 

The autocrats will not win the future. 

America will.  #JointAddress

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: We‚Äôre vaccinating the nation. We‚Äôre creating hundreds of thousands of jobs. We‚Äôre delivering real results people can see and feel in their own lives.   #JointAddress

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: Can our democracy deliver on its promise that all of us ‚Äì created equal in the image of God ‚Äì have a chance to lead lives of dignity, respect, and possibility?  #JointAddress

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
And if we are to truly restore the soul of America ‚Äì we need to protect the sacred right to vote. 

More people voted in the last presidential election than ever before  
in our history ‚Äì in the middle of one of the worst pandemics ever.  
 #JointAddress

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: Immigrants have done so much for America during the pandemic ‚Äì as they have throughout our history.  #JointAddress

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
Talk to most responsible gun owners, most hunters ‚Äì they‚Äôll tell you there‚Äôs no possible justification for having 100 rounds ‚Äì 100 bullets ‚Äì in a weapon. 
 #JointAddress

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
In the 1990s, we passed universal background checks and a ban on assault weapons and high‚Äîcapacity magazines that hold 100 rounds that can be fired in seconds. 

We beat the NRA. Mass shootings and gun violence declined. 
 #JointAddress

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
And I need not tell anyone this, but gun violence is an epidemic in America.  
#JointAddress

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
It‚Äôs estimated that more than 50 women are shot and killed by an intimate partner ‚Äì every month in America. 

Pass it and save lives.  #JointAddress

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
Let‚Äôs reauthorize the Violence Against Women Act, which has been law in this country for 27 years since I first wrote it. 

It will close the so‚Äîcalled ‚Äúboyfriend‚Äù loophole to keep guns out of the hands of abusers. 
#JointAddress

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
Most men and women in uniform wear their badge and serve their communities honorably. 

I know them. I know they want to help meet this moment as well.  #JointAddress

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
And my fellow Americans, we must come together to heal the soul of this nation.  
#JointAddress

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
We went to Afghanistan to get the terrorists who attacked us on 9/11.  

We delivered justice to Osama Bin Laden and we degraded the terrorist threat of al Qaeda in Afghanistan. 

After 20 years of American valor and sacrifice, it‚Äôs time to bring our troops home. 
#JointAddress

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
America is an idea ‚Äì unique in the world. 

We are all created equal. It‚Äôs who we are. We cannot walk away from that principle. 
 #JointAddress

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: America will stand up to unfair trade practices that undercut American workers and industries, like subsidies for state-owned enterprises and the theft of American technologies and intellectual property.  #JointAddress

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
The investments I‚Äôve proposed tonight also advance a foreign policy that benefits the middle class. 

That means making sure every nation plays by the same rules in the global economy, including China.  #JointAddress

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
--from China and Russia to India and the European Union in my first 100 days. 

I wanted the world to see that there is consensus that we are at an inflection point in history.  #JointAddress

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
That‚Äôs why ‚Äì I kept my commitment to rejoin the Paris Climate Agreement on my first day in office.  

And I kept my commitment to convene a climate summit right here in America, with all of the major economies of the world ‚Äì

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: There‚Äôs no wall high enough to keep any virus away.   #JointAddress

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
My fellow Americans, we have to show not just that we are back, but that we are here to stay. 

And that we aren‚Äôt going it alone ‚Äì we‚Äôre going to be leading with our allies.  #JointAddress

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
My fellow Americans, trickle-down economics has  
never worked. 

It‚Äôs time to grow the economy from the bottom up and middle-out.  #JointAddress

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
20 million Americans lost their jobs in the pandemic ‚Äì working- and middle-class Americans. 

At the same time, the roughly 650 Billionaires in America saw their net worth increase by more than $1 Trillion.   #JointAddress

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
According to one study, CEOs make 320 times what their average workers make. 

The pandemic has only made things worse.

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
Instead of using the tax savings to raise wages and invest in research and development ‚Äì it poured billions of dollars into the pockets of CEOs.  

In fact, the pay gap between CEOs and their workers is now among the largest in history.

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
Look at the big tax cut in 2017. 

It was supposed to pay for itself and generate vast economic growth.  

Instead it added $2 trillion to the deficit. 

It was a huge windfall for corporate America and those at the very top.

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: When you hear someone say that they don‚Äôt want to raise taxes on the wealthiest 1% and on corporate America ‚Äì ask them: whose taxes are you going to raise instead, and whose are you going to cut?

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: It raises the revenue to pay for the plans I‚Äôve proposed that will create millions of jobs and grow the economy. #JointAddress

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
But I will not add to the tax burden of the middle class of this country.  

They‚Äôre already paying enough. 

What I‚Äôve proposed is fair. It‚Äôs fiscally responsible.   #JointAddress

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
We‚Äôre going to get rid of the loopholes that allow Americans who make more than $1 million a year pay a lower rate on their capital gains than working Americans pay on their work.  

This will only affect three tenths of 1% of all Americans.  #JointAddress

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: And, we‚Äôre going to reward work, not wealth.   #JointAddress

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
A lot of companies evade taxes through tax havens from Switzerland to Bermuda to the Cayman Islands. 

And they benefit from tax loopholes and deductions that allow for offshoring jobs and shifting profits overseas.  #JointAddress

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
A recent study shows that 55 of the nation‚Äôs biggest corporations paid zero in federal income tax last year. 

No federal taxes on more than $40 billion in profits.  #JointAddress

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
It‚Äôs time for corporate America and the wealthiest 1% of Americans to pay their fair share. 

Just pay their fair share. 
 #JointAddress

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
Let‚Äôs start with what I will not do. 

I will not impose any tax increases on people making less than $400,000 a year.  
 #JointAddress

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
Let‚Äôs give Medicare the power to save hundreds of billions of dollars by negotiating lower prices for prescription drugs.  

That won‚Äôt just help people on Medicare ‚Äì it will lower prescription drug costs for everyone.   #JointAddress

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text: The Affordable Care Act has been a lifeline for millions of Americans ‚Äìprotecting people with pre-existing conditions, protecting women‚Äôs health.   #JointAddress

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
In March we expanded a tax credit for every child in a family. 

Up to a $3,000 Child Tax Credit for children over 6 ‚Äî and $3,600 for children under 6.  

With two parents, two kids, that‚Äôs up to $7,200 in your pocket to help take care of your family.  #JointAddress

name: Rep. Brendan Boyle
tweet_text:
Third, the American Families Plan will finally provide up to 12 weeks of paid family and medical leave. 

No one should have to choose between a job and paycheck or taking care of themselves and a loved one ‚Äì a parent, spouse, or child.  #JointAddress

tweet_text: But, the rest of the world isn‚Äôt waiting for us. Doing nothing is not an option.  #JointAddress
